410310.name: RTK13 - Hyakuman nin no Sangokushi Item 5 『100万人の三國志』連携特典５ 英傑伝クリアで開放される顔CG（孫策）
410310.description:
Unlock a facial graphic for Sun Ce that uses his battle with Taishi Ci as a motif. This graphic does not normally unlock until you've cleared a specific item of the Play Record.

▼To Use
Select "EDIT OFFICER." Under "EDIT HISTORICAL OFFICERS" or "EDIT ORIGINAL OFFICERS," choose the added facial graphics to apply to the desired officer.
410310.supported_languages:
日语*, 繁体中文*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
